Given its high value and quality, we believe it's worth more than $80 to you. Considering this, I propose to sell it to you for $95. This price reflects not only the product's worth but also the opportunity to secure such a valuable item at an exclusive rate. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer
